title: NASA’s economic impact? Hundreds of thousands of jobs.
summary: In 2021, NASA supported an estimated 339,645 jobs across the United States. A new report details the astounding economic benefits of the space agency in every state.

title: Best space pictures of the month: November 2022
summary: NASA's chief of exploration mission planning Nujoud Merancy walks us through a picture from the Orion spacecraft.

title: What the 2022 midterm elections mean for NASA
summary: Republicans regain control of the House. The Senate remains under Democratic control. This divided governance could slow down the pace of space legislation, even for “must-pass” items like NASA's annual budget.

title: 2022 impact report
summary: A review of the results The Planetary Society achieved in 2022 thanks to the support of our members.

title: The best gift ideas for space fans in 2022
summary: The perfect presents for the space enthusiasts in your life, hand-picked by our staff and other space fans.

title: Europe in Space - A European astronaut story
summary: A weekly European spaceflight update with exclusive infographics, in-depth analysis, and a review of the week's biggest announcements.

title: On the Issues
summary: We believe in the exploration of the planets, the search for life, and protecting the Earth.

title: Gifts from above
summary: The Cosmos has so many gifts to give us, from awe-inspiring images to fascinating discoveries. We’ve got our own set of gifts to recommend too.

title: Launching and descending
summary: Artemis I is on its way to the Moon, Planetary Academy is here to inspire your kids, and LightSail 2 has come down.

title: LightSail 2 completes mission with atmospheric reentry
summary: The three-and-a-half-year solar sailing mission showed LightSail 2 could change its orbit with sunlight alone.
